#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem free camera.

=== Overview ===
The free camera is controlled by the user. The camera orientation is fixed by a yaw axis.
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFreeCameraMoveFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double units_per_sec) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFreeCameraRotationFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double units_per_sec) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !YawFreeCamera(double camera_mode_ptr, double delta) ===
----
====Parameters====

<BR>
<BR>
